snippet: President Obama on Wednesday night is expected to describe an undertaking that would go well beyond targeted drone strikes against suspected terrorist leaders, as he has done against Al Qaeda and its affiliates.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Wednesday night is expected to describe an undertaking that would go well beyond targeted drone strikes against suspected terrorist leaders, as he has done against Al Qaeda and its affiliates.

headline.main: What Obama Faces in a Campaign Against ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
